title: My acc got hacked
body:
a question:
my acc got hacked now i need help. I already cantacted riot-support but that wasÂ´t helpful. You know any way how i can get my acc back?

replies.body: You'll need to look over those account security questions again if you weren't able to remember the answers. I wasn't seeing any tickets being sent, but you can contact them again by sending us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the option "I need help recovering my account".

54367

Don't stress to much it happened to me once this season too.  As long as you know your account you should be alright.  I was pretty surprised how fast they got me my account back.
